sentences.en: a blow which sent him sprawling
sentences.cn: 打得他四脚朝天的一拳

sentences.en: A few shanties sprawl in the weeds.
sentences.cn: 杂草丛中零零落落地歪着几所棚屋.

sentences.en: Bank personnel and clients sprawl across the floor, covering their heads.
sentences.cn: 银行里的职员和客户们尖叫着双手抱头扒在地上.

sentences.en: Boylan plays with language, letting the prose sprawl about before tightening it suddenly to great effect.
sentences.cn: 博伊兰随心所欲地驾驭着语言，先是任文章自由铺展，然后猛地收住，产生了绝好的效果。

sentences.en: Corporate sprawl distracts managers, diverts resources and muddies valuations.
sentences.cn: 公司扩张吸引管理层, 转移资源和扰乱估价.

sentences.en: From the top, Athens'urban sprawl stretches out in every direction.
sentences.cn: 雅典城区从山顶向四面八方延伸.

sentences.en: He is lying in a sprawl on the bed.
sentences.cn: 他伸开四肢躺在床上.

sentences.en: He lay there in a sprawl.
sentences.cn: 他四肢伸开躺在那里.

sentences.en: He sprawled out on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 他摊开手脚躺在沙发上。

sentences.en: He would take two aspirin and sprawl out on his bed.
sentences.cn: 他会吃两片阿司匹林，然后摊开手脚躺在床上。

sentences.en: I found a refreshing absence of industrial sprawl.
sentences.cn: 我发现了一处全无杂乱工业区踪影的、令人心旷神怡的地方.

sentences.en: I like to sprawl out in a big bed.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢四肢全伸开松散地躺在大床上.

sentences.en: I tripped on a stone and went sprawling on the pavement.
sentences.cn: 我被一块石头绊了一下，四仰八叉地摔在人行道上。

sentences.en: In our garden, bushes are allowed to sprawl as they will.
sentences.cn: 在我们园子里, 灌木丛爱怎么蔓延就怎么蔓延.

sentences.en: Recline & Sprawl is an amusingly named furniture shop in London.
sentences.cn: Recline&Sprawl是伦敦一家店名有趣的家具店。

sentences.en: She sprawled on the bed as he had left her, not even moving to cover herself up.
sentences.cn: 他离开她后，她摊开四肢躺在床上，甚至懒得动动把自己盖上。

sentences.en: The immaculately tended gardens are an oasis in the midst of Cairo's urban sprawl.
sentences.cn: 在开罗不断扩张的都市版图内，这些被悉心照料的花园成了一片世外桃源。

sentences.en: The town seemed to sprawl for miles.
sentences.cn: 这座城市杂乱无章地向外扩展，绵延数英里。

sentences.en: The whole urban sprawl of Ankara contains over 2.6 million people.
sentences.cn: 整个安卡拉城区总共容纳了260万以上的人口。

sentences.en: The whole urban sprawl of Ankara contains over 2.6m people.
sentences.cn: 安卡拉整个肆意扩展的城区容纳了260多万人口。

sentences.en: They sprawl at ease across the sofa, arms draped over the back.
sentences.cn: 他们惬意地躺在沙发上，胳膊搭在后面。

words.tran_cn: 蔓生；伸开手足躺卧姿势

phrases.tran_cn: 城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象

trans.tran_cn: （城市）杂乱无序拓展的地区，随意扩展，蔓延，蔓延物
散乱地延伸； 四肢摊开着坐、 卧或倒下
trans.tran_en: to lie or sit with your arms or legs stretched out in a lazy or careless way

trans.tran_cn: 伸开四肢坐[躺]，蔓延，杂乱无序地拓展
trans.tran_en: If you sprawl somewhere, you sit or lie down with your legs and arms spread out in a careless way
